com.cig.ds

Class SinglyLinkedList2<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cig.ds.SinglyLinkedList2<T>

  • public class SinglyLinkedList2<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    SinglyLinkedList2 The SinglyLinkedList2 class implements a singly linked list which has both head and tail pointers and a counter which stores the number of nodes in the list
    Since:
    03/01/2018

      SinglyLinkedList2()
      Constructor to initialize the head and tail variables
